concept.title: HBase Properties and Configuration File
concept.shortdesc: You can configure the HBase destination to use HBase properties.

conbody.p:
HBase destinationadditional propertiescustom propertiesHBaseThe HBase destination provides the following options for specifying HBase properties:
HBase configuration file, hbase-site.xml You can store the hbase-site.xml configuration file in a directory local to the and specify the path in the destination.
Individual properties You can configure individual HBase properties in the HBase destination. To add an HBase property, you specify the exact property name and the value. The HBase destination does not validate the property names or values.Individual properties override properties defined in the HBase configuration file.
